content.raw: Yeah. I had considered updating the `gazebo::math` api to match the `ignition::math`. My reasoning for not doing so was that users wouldn't be able to use both `gazebo::math` and `ignition::math` at the same time. The `gazebo::math` API would nominally be the same as `ignition::math`, but it wouldn't be exactly the same. Transitioning between the two, and debugging problems could be difficult.
content.html: Yeah. I had considered updating the gazebo::math api to match the ignition::math. My reasoning for not doing so was that users wouldn't be able to use both gazebo::math and ignition::math at the same time. The gazebo::math API would nominally be the same as ignition::math, but it wouldn't be exactly the same. Transitioning between the two, and debugging problems could be difficult.
